column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We were visiting Chicago from out of town and was told to go here (instead of Giordano's). There were four of us and we ordered a small Classic and Lou's
column3: and garlic bread (with cheese!). The Classic was amazing! The sauce they used was so tasty
column4: it didn't even need any of the extra seasoning some sausages have. The cheese was thick and the sauce was just the right amount. I would
column6: recommend getting the Classic over the Lou if this is your first time here :) to me it was just the better pizza!
